lead_paragraph: Dutch former rider Michael Boogerd has been banned for two years for anti-doping violations during his career, the International Cycling Union (UCI) said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Former Dutch Rider Boogerd Handed Two Year Ban for Doping
headline.main: Former Dutch Rider Boogerd Handed Two Year Ban for Doping
